name: Jurk
description:
Jurk is a top down shooter a la Berzerk. Get through as many rooms in one piece as possible.

CONTROLS:

Move with the arrow keys.

Jump with space or z. While jumping your are invulnerable and jump over objects (including the room exit). Be careful, though, as you can only jump so much before needing a break.

Shoot with alt or x.

Start and Pause with Enter.
